pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models.NumeralSystem

    Package Description
    pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models  

    • Uses of NumeralSystem in pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models

      Subclasses of NumeralSystem in pl.polsl.Szymon.Bartnik.models 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BinaryNumeralSystem
      Class representing binary numeral system and implementing methods used for computing binary system from/to other numeral systems.
      class  DecimalNumeralSystem
      Class representing decimal numeral system and implementing methods used for computing decimal system from/to other numeral systems.
      class  NotImplementedNumeralSystem
      Not implemented numeral system presenting capabilities of exclusion parameter of AdditionalInfo adnotation.

      Gets output numeral system

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Converts passed number from binary system to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.
      java.lang.String DecimalNumeralSystem.convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert, NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
      Converts passed number from decimal system to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.
      java.lang.String NotImplementedNumeralSystem.convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert, NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
      Converts passed number from input system system to the NumeralSystem identified by passed NumeralSystem implementation object.
      abstract java.lang.String NumeralSystem.convertToSpecifiedNumSystem(java.lang.String numberToConvert, NumeralSystem outputNumeralSystem)
      Converts passed number from numeral system identified by current type of this class.
